title: Arcade Kha'Zix
body:
So I thought this would be a cool idea for a skin. Since there are only 3 arcades, there should be 2 more. And one should be,
Arcade Kha' Zix   http://forums.eune.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=70027&d=1381486411

replies.body:
No, as much as I'd like more skins for Kha'zix (been maining him since release) I don't think it suits his theme and it'd be too similar to Mecha Kha'zix (incidentally my favourite skin) in terms of being colourful and technological. Additionally, skin combinations are best made one for each role so you can have a themed team, and so the jungle role is already covered with Hecarim (both Heca and Kha can be played outside of the jungle, but their most popular role is jungle).

Also, I feel like Final Boss Veigar is technically an arcade skin too, so really we're only missing a top lane arcade skin.

I'd prefer to see another Arcade skin on a champion that hasn't gotten a skin for a while. Kennen comes to mind, his ulti would be pretty epic in "Arcade mode." Other candidates include Gragas, Olaf (techno-viking, anyone?), maybe Shen or Singed.
Arcade Shyvana, leaving a rainbow in the trail of her ult.
That's  cool too but the arcade dragon....LOL

The only problem with this would be that we had Championship Shyvana released late this year. If we want to focus on less noticed champions, like {{champion:85}} , {{champion:83}}  or {{champion:13}}  (Ryze top works, right?) then this skin wouldn't be an option for quite some time.

 {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}
Yep I missed that one, that's a good one too.
Well, I see what you mean but I don't know about the others and anyways I just think its nice (but that's just my opinion.)

arcade team is only missing a top laner  but i have seen some threads that have arcade irelia which looks really good 

ps- strat fb veigar is an arcade champ
i do enjoy a good specky skin and i must say Kha'Zix would look rather cool in Arcade but what about characters like {{champion:34}} or {{champion:39}} ??
